name: Kusama Kommand
description:
Kusama Kommand

This is a Missile Command clone inspired by the work of the artist Yayoi Kusama. Play Missile Command with colourful explosions in Kusama-inspired colours, reflected to infinity.

This was developed for a short dev challenge and is functional but not complete as a game or well-optimised. The combination of duplicated objects and infinite rendercams means it won't run smoothly on mid-low range machines.

You can also find the Unity project files below, which I decided to release alongside this project in case anybody wants to see how it all works.
